about_the_game:
THE DYNAMIC ACTION GAME ABOUT COMBAT VEHICLES OF PRESENT AND FUTURE


Modern Warships is a cross-platform arcade online action game where modern naval battles look like they do in reality. Surveillance aircraft rush forward to detect the enemy from distance, cruisers launch volleys of guided missiles and try to reset enemy missile defences, submarines sneak up to surface vessels and jet fighters provide cover to the allied fleet from the air.

MODERN WARFARE



Take part in modern naval and air battles with combat vehicles that perform the way they would do in reality. With drones and precise weapons.

ALL THE TOP VEHICLES



200+ types of modern and prospective ships and aircraft including carriers, submarines, drones, stealth fighters and strategic bombers.

DYNAMIC AND PRACTICAL



Play comfortably thanks to simple controls and arcade battle mode, switch smoothly between different types of vehicles during the same battle. Be in the most fun parts of battlefield!

DO IT YOURSELF


Use the potent customization system that allows you to change and modify almost all components of ships and aircraft. Bring the full power of supersonic missiles down on your enemy!

THE GAME NEVER FAILS TO IMPRESS



Modern Warships regularly receives new battle maps, combat vehicles and weapons while in-game tournaments, events and other activities provide new gaming experience and cover the subject of modern naval and air battles from different perspectives.

name: Modern Warships

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 10.1: AMD Radeon HD 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. Minimum resolution – 720p
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 7 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 11: AMD Radeon HD 87XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060. Recommended resolution – 1080p
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Modern Warships is an online action game about contemporary military vehicles. Join now and detect the enemy with recon aircraft, launch volleys of guided missiles from cruisers, sneak up to surface vessels with submarines, and provide cover to the allied fleet with jet fighters and helicopters.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*, Italian, Arabic, Dutch, Greek, Indonesian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Filipino, Hindi, Malay
*languages with full audio support
